options.description: Print USAGE and DESCRIPTION;  ignore all other parameters
Print USAGE, DESCRIPTION and ARGUMENTS; ignore all other parameters
Print version number;  ignore other arguments
Input file name
Location on the query sequence in 1-based offsets (Format: start-stop)
Query strand(s) to search against database/subject (Default = `both')
Genetic code to use to translate query (see  https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/Taxonomy/taxonomyhome.html/index.cgi?chapter=cgencodes for details) (Default = `1')
Task to execute (Default = `blastx')
BLAST database name
Output file name (Default = `-')
Expectation value (E) threshold for saving hits (Default = `10')
Word size for wordfinder algorithm
Cost to open a gap
Cost to extend a gap
Length of the largest intron allowed in a translated nucleotide sequence when linking multiple distinct alignments (Default = `0')
Scoring matrix name (normally BLOSUM62)
Minimum word score such that the word is added to the BLAST lookup table
Use composition-based statistics (Default = `2')
Subject sequence(s) to search
Location on the subject sequence in 1-based offsets (Format: start-stop)
alignment view options:
Show NCBI GIs in deflines?
Number of database sequences to show one-line descriptions for. Not applicable for outfmt > 4. (Default = `500')
Number of database sequences to show alignments for. (Default = `250')
Line length for formatting alignments. Not applicable for outfmt > 4. (Default = `60')
Produce HTML output?
Sorting option for hits:
Sorting option for hps:
Filter query sequence with SEG (Format: 'yes', 'window locut hicut', or 'no' to disable) (Default = `12 2.2 2.5')
Apply filtering locations as soft masks (Default = `false')
Use lower case filtering in query and subject sequence(s)?
Restrict search of database to list of GIs
Restrict search of database to list of SeqIDs
Restrict search of database to everything except the specified GIs
Restrict search of database to everything except the specified SeqIDs
Restrict search of database to include only the specified taxonomy IDs
Restrict search of database to everything except the specified taxonomy IDs
Restrict search of database to include only the specified taxonomy IDs
Restrict search of database to everything except the specified taxonomy IDs
Restrict search of database to list of IPGs
Restrict search of database to everything except the specified IPGs
Restrict search with the given Entrez query
Filtering algorithm ID to apply to the BLAST database as soft masking
Filtering algorithm ID to apply to the BLAST database as hard masking
Percent query coverage per hsp
Set maximum number of HSPs per subject sequence to save for each query
If the query range of a hit is enveloped by that of at least this many
Best Hit algorithm overhang value (recommended value: 0.1)
Best Hit algorithm score edge value (recommended value: 0.1)
Turn on best hit per subject sequence
Maximum number of aligned sequences to keep (value of 5 or more is recommended) (Default = `500')
Effective length of the database
Effective length of the search space
Use sum statistics
Search strategy to use
File name to record the search strategy used
X-dropoff value (in bits) for ungapped extensions
X-dropoff value (in bits) for preliminary gapped extensions
X-dropoff value (in bits) for final gapped alignment
Multiple hits window size, use 0 to specify 1-hit algorithm
Perform ungapped alignment only?
Should the query and subject defline(s) be parsed?
Number of threads (CPUs) to use in the BLAST search (Default = `1')
Execute search remotely?
Compute locally optimal Smith-Waterman alignments?
